TopicTitle: KSP RP forum server CPU usage exceeded.

Articles.Content: We were minding our own business when somebody decides it\'d be alright to go into someone else\'s country and start shooting people, don\'t lecture us about being too interventionist. We\'re trying to give the country back to Uman, but he insists that everyone in the entire country is his very interesting version of \'centrist\'. Iman, we\'re talking in the present tense, and trade embargoes are hardly lethal.

Alright, here\'s the explanation. Apparently, something sent out like 15 emails in one minute. I have no idea what, but that happened apparently. So, they\'ve suspended my account until such time as I can get through to their customer service and get that fixed.

> 
> Alright, here\'s the explanation. Apparently, something sent out like 15 emails in one minute. I have no idea what, but that happened apparently. So, they\'ve suspended my account until such time as I can get through to their customer service and get that fixed.

emails or PM\'s? Tim talked to me about a message being sent to everyone on the forum by someone.

> 
> 'sigh' may my sig and whatever is left of the Spearkan Federation rest in peace

It just so happens that i possess the island of Spearka should you be interested.

> 
> emails or PM\'s? Tim talked to me about a message being sent to everyone on the forum by someone.

Emails, which are extra-forum. PM\'s are intra-forum. If we got busted for PM\'s, we\'d have been out the moment the forum started.

> 
> Emails, which are extra-forum. PM\'s are intra-forum. If we got busted for PM\'s, we\'d have been out the moment the forum started.

How is that even possible? We don\'t have each other\'s addresses, can a spambot carry this through?

> 
> How is that even possible? We don\'t have each other\'s addresses, can a spambot carry this through?

I think it might have been the forum emailing me that the forum was down again.

> 
> I think it might have been the forum emailing me that the forum was down again.

Oh god the irony, it hurts.

> 
> We were minding our own business when somebody decides it\'d be alright to go into someone else\'s country and start shooting people, don\'t lecture us about being too interventionist. We\'re trying to give the country back to Uman, but he insists that everyone in the entire country is his very interesting version of \'centrist\'. Iman, we\'re talking in the present tense, and trade embargoes are hardly lethal.

1. Remember the first killing? And you know, bombings? Please, when a nation houses a group that kills world leaders, that nation will be hated by everything.

2. Give it? Ascen apparently is 'my way or the highway' while I am trying to remake the original UoSoV from the RP that was on this forum. Basically, the one with a crappy army and the one place anyone could go without getting shot at by a potato.

3. By centrist, I refer to mixed economic. If a wrong term, go blame Wikipedia.

Never break rule two in those forums.

Which already has occured, since I claim it.

BWAHAHAHA.
[mod]Okay People, this is not the place for roleplaying. Let's keep everything nice and roleplay free until those help desk people decide to take a look at my help ticket.[/mod]
Imandreas, we won\'t be discussing any of that here, i think we should spare this place from the craziness that the latest events have caused.

Im pretty sure I Pm\'ed a lot, lol ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I still dont really understand the entire email thing, so did the forum send you a message, or what?

> 
> Im pretty sure I Pm\'ed a lot, lol ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
> 
> I still dont really understand the entire email thing, so did the forum send you a message, or what?

The forum sent me messages telling me the forum was unable to contact the server (that happens every few days, so its normal and I just ignore them). However, this time it must\'ve gone crazy trying to reconnect and sent me a bunch of them before the webhost stopped it for sending out 15 in a minute.
Oh the irony. Its.. just...so...argh
I think it was me. My computer crashed completely on me, when I was attempting to send something. It could\'ve caused something to happen.
so what do we do now?

> 
> I think it was me. My computer crashed completely on me, when I was attempting to send something. It could\'ve caused something to happen.

I had that except four times and with power cuts. Over a few days. I don\'t think it was that.

> 
> so what do we do now?

We wait for Radion\'s host to get off their asses and fix the forum.
ok, lets hope that\'\'ll be soon ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

> 
> ok, lets hope that\'\'ll be soon ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

I need to make more stupidity and embarrassment, or I will have to make a forum myself.

/sarcasm

 (Yes, the whole boom thing was also sarcasm)
I have a choice here. Small hyper Orwellian dystopia, or large communist slightly Orwellian country?
HYPER!

Attention there is a new forum founded for those who can\'t do the test. You must all be approved by me, before proceeding. I can accept what some people may say to change.

URL: [http://ksproleplay.freeforums.org/index.php?sid=adbfede46cc8f0d850130cbe8c99dac8](http://ksproleplay.freeforums.org/index.php?sid=adbfede46cc8f0d850130cbe8c99dac8)
I\'ll just wait for the original, populated and time-invested server to come back online. No rush guys.
Rejoice, the forum krp.net78.net is back online!

> 
> Rejoice, the forum krp.net78.net is back online!

Wonderful. Two forums to manage. JUST JOKING!

> 
> Rejoice, the forum krp.net78.net is back online!

So we can join?
